member.name: D3D10_MAPPED_TEXTURE3D
member.summary: Provides access to subresource data in a 3D texture.

member.name: D3D10_MAPPED_TEXTURE3D.RowPitch
member.summary: The pitch, or width, or physical size (in bytes) of one row of an uncompressed texture. Since a block-compressed texture is encoded in 4x4 blocks, the RowPitch for a compressed texture is the number of bytes in a block of 4x4 texels. See virtual size vs physical size for more information on block compression.

member.name: D3D10_MAPPED_TEXTURE3D.DepthPitch
member.summary: The pitch or number of bytes in all rows for a single depth.
